group_1.textLeft: I heard that Sasha defeated the Witch.
As expected, it appears the opponent was a@Magical Girl we knew...

group_1.textRight: It's not like Witches these days just drift in or@show up randomly.
They're only born from our friends...

group_1.textLeft: That's right...
Witnessing someone's transformation into a Witch,
and being able to recognize her based on her@characteristics, is extremely distressing...

group_1.textRight: Yeah...
There are only two left whose reactions I can feel@nearby. We've taken down quite a few already.
They, too, are probably former Magical Girls@we once knew.
We need to be prepared...
Is everything alright with the Eradication Faction?@I'm worried they'll interfere in some way...

group_1.textLeft: Thanks to movement amongst the professors,@the Advocates are gaining momentum again.
I got a message from Shiroganeâ€•@Some members from the Eradicators have arrived.
We'll be able to stay ahead of them since it's@easy enough to grasp their movements.
The outcome rests in our hands now.
There are only two Witches left today, so I'll go@with you to take care of one.

group_1.textRight: Alright, sounds good.

group_1.textLeft: Well then, I'll team up with her to take out the last.
[se:7201_detect_magic][chara:103400:effect_ef_adv_01]This reaction... We're pretty close...
Do you happen to know who she was?

group_1.textRight: Do you know the head of the swimming club at@Yukuni Aonami Academy?

group_1.textLeft: Of course, she's quite famous for being an@excellent swimmer.
An excellent Magical Girl too, she was able to@help me before...
No way...!

group_1.textRight: Yes, this magic reaction is hers.
I was the manager of the swimming club, and I had@been spreading the word about Magical Girls.
Then we became the bad guys, especially after@I mentioned our rings...
She became a target for the Eradicators, too.

group_1.textLeft: ...I don't know how to properly apologize for@what we started...

group_1.textRight: It's my fault for being so naive and talking to@people who I didn't trust.
Rather, I'm just disgusted that I took away her@splendid school life...

group_1.textLeft: Are you really sure it's her...?
In the Yukuni City group message, how did it say@she disappeared?

group_1.textRight: She hated social media and networking, so I@handled her communications.

group_1.textLeft: I see...

group_1.textRight: Hey, Miura.
She was pretty skilled as a Magical Girl.
Not only did she help the townspeople, but she@also aided other Magical Girls.

group_1.textLeft: She even came to my aid once.

group_1.textRight: If she's still as formidable now as a Witch, and we@can't beat her together...
I'll immobilize her while you strike through@the both of us at once.
